title: Dead Space Directly Download
description: A massive deep-space mining ship goes dark after unearthing a strange artifact on a distant planet. Engineer Isaac Clarke embarks on the repair mission, only to uncover a nightmarish blood bath the ship’s crew horribly slaughtered and infected by alien scourge. Now Isaac is cut off, trapped, and engaged in a desperate fight for survival. Ultimate Admiral Dreadnoughts

system_requirements.Memory: 1 GB RAM or more for Windows XP (2 GB for Vista)
system_requirements.Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible video card, Shader Model 3.0 required, 256 MB or better,
